original_text:
“Come, let us return to the Lord.
He has torn us to pieces
    but he will heal us;
he has injured us
    but he will bind up our wounds.
korean_text: 오라 우리가 여호와께로 돌아가자 여호와께서 우리를 찢으셨으나 도로 낫게 하실 것이요 우리를 치셨으나 싸매어 주실 것임이라

sentences.original_text: Come, let us return to the Lord.
He has torn us to pieces
but he will bind up our wounds.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 우리의 상처를 싸매 주실 것이다.
